net.asrex.skillful.ui

Interface PerkUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionBar

    public interface PerkUI
    Defines necessary functionality for a base perk UI. Perk UIs should have some method for displaying a list of perks to the user, and can (with user input) enable or disable player perks as needed.
